ygData.subject: Your arguments
ygData.msgSnippet: Your arguments are greatly flawed.  Which pure magic users can take on more than one low level monster at once?  If you want to take on multiple low level
ygData.messageBody:
Your arguments are greatly flawed. Which pure magic users can take on more
than one low level monster at once? If you want to take on multiple low
level creatures at once it sounds to me like you want to be a warrior. Also
6 necromancers vs one warrior is not fair. Monster levels are diffrently
calculated. For example a level 30 warrior cant take on a griffin by
himself. Now on to more on topic matters:

I had my Old Erudain skill level up to Excellent. For some strange reason
it dropped back to Very Good??? /tell and regular say has been proven to
increase language skill. Just be close to the person. If there is anyone
on Faydwer and on the Karana server please contact me if you can teach me
Old Erudian to Excellent skill level again... I am mostly on at Weekends
(includes Fridays).


Fyleow
Magician of the 6th circle
Karana Server
